participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Warm-hearted, creative, and family-oriented. Loves to share experiences and enjoys cooking.
participant_1.background: My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving because I love to cook for my family and friends. I'm proud that I'm able to provide a healthy alternative to sugary drinks for my family and community. I own a computer that is suitable for my needs. I am twenty five years old. I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious, creative, and sociable. Enjoys sharing his work and is passionate about sports.
participant_2.background: I am busy working with publishers but I make time for my family. I am a little light for my age, but I am growing well. I watch every football game at Alabama. I love to share my short films with my friends and get their feedback. I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends.

content.text: Hi! I'm excited to be here today. What about you?
Hi! I'm doing well. Thanks for asking!
What do you do for fun?
I like to watch football games and make short films.
That's cool! I like to watch Taylor Swift concerts.
Oh! I've never seen her in concert.
She's amazing! I went with my friend who came from out of town.
That sounds fun! I'm not sure I'd be able to handle a concert that long though.
Haha, it was pretty long. But it was worth it!
I'm sure it was! What else do you like to do?
I like to cook for my family and friends.
Oh! That's a great skill to have.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make Thanksgiving dinner for my family.
That's a great tradition! I'm sure your family loves it.
They do! It's always a lot of fun.
